SA15bsa066_u:12: iha prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ prayojanādiśūnye na kvacitpravartanta ityato 'dhikṛtaśāstrasya prayojanādipradarśanena prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyarthamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:13_1: śāstramārabhyate ityukte saṃbhavatyevaṃvādī paraḥ- nārabdhavyamidaṃ prayojanarahitatvāt unmattakavākyavat /
SA15bsa066_u:15: tathā asaṃbaddhatvāt daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpāḥ kuṇḍamajājinaṃ palalapiṇḍaṃ sara kīṭiketyādivākyavat /
SA15bsa066_u:17: ayaṃ cābhidheyaprayojane eva darśayati sākṣāt saṃbandhaṃ tu sāmarthyena /
SA15bsa066_u:18: yathā caitadevaṃ tathā sukhapratipattyarthamevameva leśato vyākhyāya darśayiṣyāmaḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:21: vyākhyāṃ vihāya tattvajñaiḥ sā coktā padavākyayoḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:24: sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca eva sābhāsam parasaṃvide pratyakṣam anumānam ca sābhāsam tu ātmasaṃvide iti padāni //
SA15bsa066_u:26: sādhyate aneneti siddhirvā sādhayatīti vā sādhanam /
SA15bsa066_u:36: nanu vakṣyati sādhanadoṣodbhāvanāni dūṣaṇānīti tadetatkatham / ucyate /
SA15bsa066_u:37: sādhanābhāsa eva kiṃcitsāmyena sādhanopacārādadoṣaḥ ityetacca tatraiva nirloṭhayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:50: parasaṃvide ityatra pare prāśnikāḥ saṃvedanaṃ saṃvid avabodha ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:51: pareṣāṃ saṃvit parasaṃvit tasyai parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya /
SA15bsa066_u:56: sādhanadūṣaṇe eva sābhāse parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya na pratyakṣānumāne /
SA15bsa066_u:58: yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ pārthe dhanurdhārayati sati ko 'nyo dhanurdhārayati iti //
SA15bsa066_u:59: pratyakṣam ityatra akṣamindriyaṃ tataśca pratigatamakṣaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryatvenendriyaṃ prati gatamityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:60: idaṃ ca vakṣyati pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍham ityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:61: tathā mīyate aneneti mānaṃ paricchedyata ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:77: ātmā ceha cittacaittasaṃtānarūpaḥ parigṛhyate na tu paraparikalpito nittyatvādidharmā /
SA15bsa066_u:81: pratyakṣānumāne eva sābhāse ātmasaṃvide ātmāvabodhāya na sādhanadūṣaṇe ātmasaṃvitphalatvāt tayoḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:82: āha nanu sādhanamapi vastuto 'numānameva tataścānumānamityādyukte sādhanābhidhānaṃ na yujyate asminvā prāgukte anumānābhidhānamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:93: iha ca sādhanādayo 'ṣṭau padārthāḥ abhidheyatayā uktāḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:112: idamiha śrotaṇāṃ prayojanamuktaṃ kartustarhi kiṃ prayojanamiti vācyam /
SA15bsa066_u:129: tatra yathoddeśastathā nirdeśa iti kṛtvā sādhanasvarūpāvadhāraṇāyāha //
SA15bsa066_u:132: tatra teṣu sādhanādiṣu sādhanaṃ tāvannirdhāryate iti /
SA15bsa066_u:134: atra guṇanimittaṃ sādhanatvena guṇena nirdhāryate iti /
SA15bsa066_u:154: na punaryathā lambakarṇaḥ brāhmaṇādayo varṇā iti /
SA15bsa066_u:158: na punarādīyate ityādiḥ yathā brāhmaṇādayo varṇā ityadāviti /
SA15bsa066_u:159: tataḥ susthitamidaṃ pakṣaḥ ādiryeṣāṃ te pakṣādayaḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:162: iha ca yadā sādhyate 'neneti sādhanaṃ karaṇābhidhānārthaḥ sādhanaśabdastadā pakṣopalakṣitāni hetutvādivacanāni sādhanam /
SA15bsa066_u:164: yadā punarbhāvasādhanaḥ siddhiḥ sādhanamiti tadā pakṣādivacanajanyaṃ pratipādyagataṃ jñānameva sādhanam /
SA15bsa066_u:168: yadā tu kartṛsādhanaḥ sādhayatīti sādhanaṃ tadā pakṣādivacanānyeva kartṛtvena vivakṣyante pratipādyasaṃtāne jñānotpādakatvāt iti /
SA15bsa066_u:174: uktaṃ ca diṅnāgācāryeṇa sādhanamiti caikavacananirdeśaḥ samastasādhanatvakhyāpanārthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:177: idaṃ ca na jñāyate kiṃ kārakamuta vyañjakam /
SA15bsa066_u:203: ye yathoktāḥ prāśnikāḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ kaścidapratīto 'rtha iti /
SA15bsa066_u:207: nanu cātra cāturthyā kriyayā ceti vaktavyalakṣaṇayā bhavitavyaṃ tatkimartha ṣaṣṭhyatrocyate /
SA15bsa066_u:222: dharmāḥ kṛtakatvādayaste 'sya vidyante iti dharmī śabdādiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:231: iha dharmiṇastāvatprasiddhatā yuktā viśeṣaṇasya tvanityatvāderna yujyate /
SA15bsa066_u:236: iha prasiddhatā viśeṣaṇasya na tasminneva dharmiṇi samāśrīyate kiṃtu dharmyantare ghaṭādau /
SA15bsa066_u:243: īpsitaḥ abhimataḥ iṣṭa icchāyā vyāpta ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:244: iha ca viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedakatvātprasiddho dharmītyanenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya pakṣābhāsasya vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:248_0: etena yadyapi kvacicchāstre sthtiaḥ sādhanamāha tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmindharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame
SA15bsa066_u:248_1: 'pi yastadānena vādinā dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavatīti
SA15bsa066_u:254: ityanena dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī pakṣa ityāveditaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa066_u:255: tataśca na dharmamātraṃ na dharmī kevalaḥ na svatantramubhayaṃ na ca tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kiṃtu dharmadharmiṇorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti bhāvārthaḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:256: iha coktalakṣaṇayoge satyapyaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevamādīnāmapi pratyakṣāviruddhānāṃ pakṣatvaprāptyātivyāptirnāma lakṣaṇadoṣaḥ prāpnotītyastannivṛttyarthamāha /
SA15bsa066_u:269: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasyāsau trirūpaḥ trisvabhāva ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:270: ekasya vastuno nānātvamapaśyan pṛcchaka āha kiṃ punastrirūpyam /
SA15bsa066_u:274: evaṃ pṛcchakena pṛṣṭaḥ sannāhācāryaḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣe cāsattvameva /
SA15bsa066_u:292: tathā ca satyekāntato vipakṣavyāvṛttāḥ sapakṣaikadeśavyāpino 'pi prayatnānantarīyakatvādayaḥ samyagghetava evetyāveditaṃ bhavati //
SA15bsa066_u:293: sapakṣe sattvamityādi yaduktaṃ tatra sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ svarūpamajānāno vineyaḥ pṛcchati /
SA15bsa066_u:294: kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ ko vā vipakṣa iti /
SA15bsa066_u:328: iha ca sādhyapratibandhatvāt sādhanasya tadapi nāstīti gamyate /
SA15bsa066_u:338: kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ vā anityādau heturiti yogaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:340: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti /
SA15bsa066_u:344: tasya prayatnānantaraṃ tatra bhāvo jāta iti vā prayatnānantarīyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:352: ayaṃ ca hetuḥ kiṃ pakṣadharma eva na tu pakṣasyaiva dharmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:356: tathā saphala evāstvanyayogavyavacchedaḥ yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:357: anena tu sādhāraṇādīnāṃ navānāmapi hetvābhāsānāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:359: yadi sapakṣa evāsti tataśca tadvyatirekeṇānyatra pakṣe 'pyabhāvāt dharmatvānupapattiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:363: yadyevaṃ vipakṣe nāsti eveti tṛtīyamavadhāraṇaṃ kimartham? /
SA15bsa066_u:367: anvayavyatirekayorekamapi rūpamuktaṃ kathaṃ nu nāma dvitīyasyākṣepakaṃ syāditi /
SA15bsa066_u:378: dve vidhe yasya sa dvividhastadeva dvaividhyam /
SA15bsa066_u:380: samāno dharmo yasyāsau sadharmā sadharmaṇo bhāvaḥ sādharmyaṃ tena /
SA15bsa066_u:381: visadṛśo dharmo yasyāsau vidharmā vidharmaṇo bhāvaḥ vaidharmyaṃ tena /
SA15bsa066_u:387: sapakṣa uktalakṣaṇastasmiṃścāstitvaṃ vidyamānatvaṃ khyāpyate pratipādyate vacanena /
SA15bsa066_u:389: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ iti sugamam /
SA15bsa066_u:415: na tu bhāvādanyo 'bhāvo nāma vastusvarūpo 'sti evaṃ nityaśabdenātretyādi dārṣṭāntike 'pi bhāvitameva //
SA15bsa066_u:426: yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti sapakṣānugamavacanam /
SA15bsa066_u:437: tatrāpi pakṣādivacanāni sādhanamiti pakṣasyopalakṣaṇatvātprathamaṃ pakṣa uktaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:453: iha punaḥ pratyakṣaśabdena tatparicchinno dharmaḥ parigṛhyate śālikuḍavanyāyāt /
SA15bsa066_u:462: ayaṃ ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi pratyakṣaprasiddhena śrāvaṇatvena virudhyate iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:464: śrāvaṇatvaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇatvātpratyakṣagamyameva na bhavati kathaṃ pratyakṣaprasiddhadharmaviruddhaḥ? iti /
SA15bsa066_u:467: atra ca bahu vaktavyaṃ tattu nocyate /
SA15bsa066_u:478: vaiśeṣiko 'hamityevaṃ pakṣaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā yadā śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānite tadāgamavirūddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:480: uktaṃ ca buddhimatpūrvā vākyakṛtirvede tadvacanādāmnāyasya prāmāṇyamityādi //
SA15bsa066_u:485: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi lokaprasiddhaśucitvena nirākriyata iti /
SA15bsa066_u:494: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi svavacanaprasiddhena mātṛtvena viruddhyate /
SA15bsa066_u:495: virodhaśca mātṛśabdena prasavadharmiṇī vanitocyate vandhyāśabdena tadviparītā /
SA15bsa066_u:496: tataśca yadi mātā kathaṃ vandhyā? vandhyā cetkathaṃ māteti? //
SA15bsa066_u:498: bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabde iti /
SA15bsa066_u:505: ayaṃ ca bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati aprasiddhiviśeṣaṇaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:518: ato dṛṣṭāntaṃ prasādhya prayogaḥ kartavya iti /
SA15bsa066_u:521: tathā aprasiddhaviśeṣyo yathā sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati cetana ātmeti /
SA15bsa066_u:525: iti pakṣaḥ sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:536: tathāhi- tantavaḥ paṭasya samacāyikāraṇaṃ tantusaṃyogo 'samavāyikāraṇaṃ turīvemādayastu nimittakāraṇam /
SA15bsa066_u:541: na tasyātmā viśeṣyaḥ siddho nāpi samavāyikāraṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
SA15bsa066_u:544: tathā prasiddhasaṃbandho yathā śrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti /
SA15bsa066_u:545: prasiddho vādiprativādinoravipratipattyā sthitaḥ saṃbandho dharmadharmilakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:556: dharmasvarūpasya nirākaraṇaṃ tattathā mukhamiva mukhaṃ dvāramiti bhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:566: viphalasya bhāvo vaiphalyaṃ sādhanasya vaiphalyaṃ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ tasmātsādhanavaiphalyataḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:580: asiddhaḥ sidhyati sa siddhaḥ pratītaḥ na siddhaḥ asiddhaḥ apratītaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:587: anyatarasya vādinaḥ prativādino vā asiddha anyatarāsiddhaḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:596: śabdānityatve sādhye anityaḥ śabdaḥ ityetasmin cākṣuṣatvāditi /
SA15bsa066_u:599: tathāhi- cākṣuṣatvaṃ na vādinaḥ prasiddhaṃ nāpi prativādinaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:603: vartate kṛtakatvādityayaṃ hetuḥ śabdābhivyaktivādinaṃ mīmāṃsakaṃ kāpilaṃ vā pratyanyatarāsiddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:604: tathāhi- na tasya tālvoṣṭhapuṭādibhiḥ kriyate śabdaḥ kiṃtvabhivyajyata iti //
SA15bsa066_u:606: bāṣpo jalādiprabhavaḥ sa ādiryasya reṇuvartyādeḥ sa bāṣpādistasya bhāvaḥ sattā tena bāṣpādibhāvena /
SA15bsa066_u:607: saṃdihyamānaḥ kimayaṃ dhūma uta bāṣpa uta reṇuvartiriti saṃdehamāpadyamānaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:612: niścito hi dhūmo dhūmatvena hutavahaṃ gamayati nāniścita iti /
SA15bsa066_u:618: saṃkhyā parimāṇaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogo vibhāgaḥ śabdeśceti //
SA15bsa066_u:623: pañca imāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ kalpanāmātram /
SA15bsa066_u:625: atītaḥ addhā anāgataḥ addhā pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ ākāśaṃ pugdala iti /
SA15bsa066_u:626: nanu cānyo 'pyasti asiddhaḥ sa ca dvidhā /
SA15bsa066_u:650: ṣaṭ prakārā asyeti ṣaṭprakāraḥ ṣaḍ vidhaityarthaḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:657: dvayorbahūnāṃ vā yaḥ sāmānyaḥ sa sādhāraṇaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:658: pramīyate iti prameyo jñeya ityarthaḥ tadbhāvaḥ prameyatvaṃ tasmātprameyatvāt pramāṇaparicchedyatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:665: nityaścānityaśca nityānityau nityānityau ca tau pakṣau ca nityānityapakṣau /
SA15bsa066_u:670: kiṃ ghaṭavat prameyatvādanityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvidākāśavat prameyatvānnitya iti prakaṭārthaṃ darśayati /
SA15bsa066_u:683: sādhāraṇavilakṣaṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ asāmānyaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ san sapakṣavipakṣābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:689: tatredaṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ svadharmiṇaṃ vihāya na sapakṣe ākāśādau nāpi vipakṣe ghaṭādau vartata iti saṃśayanimittam /
SA15bsa066_u:697: yadasti tena nityena vā bhavitavyamanityena vā nānyathā /
SA15bsa066_u:704: yadi tadanyatra nitye vānitye vopalabdhaṃ bhavati tatastabdalenetaratrāpi niścayo yujyate nānyathā /
SA15bsa066_u:711: samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ tasyaikadeśaḥ sapakṣaikadeśaḥ tasminvṛttirasyeti sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:712: tathā visadṛśaḥ pakṣo vipakṣastaṃ vyāptuṃ śīlamasyeti vipakṣavyāpī /
SA15bsa066_u:757: upanyastaḥ san tathāvidhārthānirākṛteḥ pratiyoginaṃ na vyabhicaratīti bhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:759: anye tu viruddhaścāsāvavyabhicārī ca viruddhāvyabhicārīti vyācakṣate /
SA15bsa066_u:766: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikeṇokte mīmāṃsaka āha /
SA15bsa066_u:768: śabdatvaṃ hi nāma veṇuvīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavādibhedabhinneṣu sarvaśabdeṣu śabda ityabhinnābhidhānapratyayanibandhanaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣasaṃjñitaṃ nityamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:770: ekatra dharmiṇi ubhayoḥ kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvayoḥ saṃśayahetutvāt saṃdehahetutvā /
SA15bsa066_u:771: tathā caikatra dharmiṇi kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvākhyau hetu saṃdehaṃ kurutaḥ kiṃ kṛtakatvādghaṭavadanityaḥ āhosvicchrāvaṇatvācchabdatvavannityaḥ iti /
SA15bsa066_u:772: evaṃ saṃdehahetutve pratipādite paraścodayati kiṃ samastayoḥ saṃdehahetutvam uta vyastayoḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:784: sa cānenāṃśenācāryeṇa bhinna upātta iti tasmādadoṣaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:793: tathā hyayaṃ dharmasvarūpādiviparītasādhanārddharmeṇa dharmiṇā vā virudhyata eveti catuḥprakāraścaturbhedaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:801: tasya svarūpamasādhāraṇāmātmalakṣaṇa dharmasvarūpaṃ tasya viparītasādhana iti samāsaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:804: yathā nitya śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvādvā ityayaṃ heturvipakṣa eva bhāvadviruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:810: āha ayamapakṣadharmatvādasiddhānna viśiṣyate kathaṃ viruddha iti? /
SA15bsa066_u:821: dharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhana ityasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavat iti /
SA15bsa066_u:830: tatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā melakaḥ saṃghātastasya bhāvaḥ saṃghātatvaṃ tasmātsaṃghātatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:835: yathaitadaṅgāni saṃghātatvāddevadattādiparārthāni vartante evaṃ cakṣurādayo 'pīti bhāvārthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:838: ayaṃ hetuḥ saṃghātatvalakṣano yathā yena prakāreṇa pārārthyaṃ parārthabhāvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sādhayati tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa saṃhatatvamapi sāvayavatvamapi parasyātmanaḥ sādhayati /
SA15bsa066_u:842: ubhayatreti parārthe saṃhatatve ca avyabhicārād gamakatvādityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:843: tathā caivamapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva saṃhataparārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavaditi /
SA15bsa066_u:844: śayanāsaṇādyaṅgāni hi saṃhatasya karacaraṇorugrīvādimata evārthaṃ kurvanti nānyasya /
SA15bsa066_u:846: āha vipakṣa eva bhāvādviruddha iti sāmānyaṃ viruddhalakṣaṇaṃ tatkathamihopapadyate? iti /
SA15bsa066_u:848: asaṃhataparavipakṣo hi saṃhata iti tatraiva vṛttidarśanāt /
SA15bsa066_u:859: tataḥ pṛthvyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti dravyāṇi /
SA15bsa066_u:861: rūparasagandhasparśasaṃkhyāparimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhiḥ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣāḥ prayatnaśceti sūtroktāḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:862: caśabdāt dravatvaṃ gurutvaṃ saṃskāraḥ sneho dharmādharmau śabdaśceti /
SA15bsa066_u:868: tatra paraṃ sattā bhāvo mahāsāmānyamiti cocyate /
SA15bsa066_u:877: ekadravyavattvādityatra ekaṃ ca taddravyaṃ ca ekadravyamasyāstīti āśrayabhūtamiti ekadravyavān /
SA15bsa066_u:881: vaiśeṣikasya hi adravyaṃ dravyaṃ anekadravyaṃ ca dravyam /
SA15bsa066_u:886: ityato dravyalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatvāt na dravyaṃ bhāva iti /
SA15bsa066_u:889: dravyatvaṃ hi navasu dravyeṣu vartamānatvātsāmānyaṃ guṇakarmabhyo vyāvartamānatvādviśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:891: tataśca sāmānyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaśca sa iti sāmānyaviśeṣastena tulyaṃ vartata iti sāmānyaviśeṣavat /
SA15bsa066_u:894: yathā navasu dravyeṣu pratyekaṃ vartamānaṃ dravyaṃ na bhavati kiṃtu sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ dravyatvameva evaṃ bhāvo 'pītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:895: āha yadi nāma dravyaṃ na bhavati tathāpi guṇobhaviṣyati karma ca ityetadapi nirācikīrṣurāha /
SA15bsa066_u:897: tataśca na guṇo bhāvaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvād guṇatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:898: yadi ca bhāvo guṇaḥ syānna tarhi guṇeṣu varteta nirguṇatvād guṇānām /
SA15bsa066_u:901: tathā na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvātkarmatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:902: yadi ca bhāvaḥ karma syāt na tarhi karmasu varteta niṣkarmakatvātkarmaṇām /
SA15bsa066_u:907: ayaṃ ca hetustriprakāro 'pi yathā dravyādipratiṣedhaṃ sādhayati tathā bhāvasya dharmiṇo 'bhāvatvamapi sādhayati /
SA15bsa066_u:913: yatathaidbaktuṃ śakyate na dravyaṃ bhāvaḥ ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat evamidamapi śakyate bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:915: evaṃ na guṇaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:916: atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:918: evaṃ na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:921: āha ayamasiddhānna viśiṣyate iti kathaṃ viruddhaḥ? /
SA15bsa066_u:923: na bhāvo nāma dravyādivyatiriktaḥ kaścidasti saugatānām /
SA15bsa066_u:926: kiṃtu paraprasiddho 'pi vipakṣamātravyāpī viruddha iti nidarśanārthatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:931: tathāpyanityaḥ śabdaḥ pākyatvādghatavat pākyaḥ śabda iti viruddhapreraṇāyāṃ kṛtakatvānvitāpākyapaṭādidṛṣṭāntāntarasāmarthyāttannivṛttyā na viruddhatā /
SA15bsa066_u:938: yata uktaṃ saditi yato dravyaguṇakarmasu sā sattā /
SA15bsa066_u:940_0: ayameva heturekadravyavattvākhyaḥ asminneva pūrvapakṣe na dravyaṃ bhāva ityādilakṣaṇe
SA15bsa066_u:940_1: asyaiva dharmiṇo bhāvākhyasya yo viśeṣo dharmaḥ satpratyayakartṛtvaṃ nāma tadviparitamasatpratyayakartṛtvamapi sādhayati /
SA15bsa066_u:942: tathā hyetadapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva bhāvaḥ satpratyayakartā na bhavati ekadravyavattvādravyatvat /
SA15bsa066_u:951: tatra yathā dṛṣṭānto dvividhaḥ evaṃ mūlabhedavyapekṣayā tadābhāso 'pi tathā /
SA15bsa066_u:958: tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvaddṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ pañcaprakāraḥ pañcabhedaḥ tadyathā /
SA15bsa066_u:963: na tu bahubrīhau niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvaṃ nipatatīti kṛtvāsiddhasādhanadharmā iti /
SA15bsa066_u:966: anye tu sādhanadharmeṇa rahitatvādasiddhaḥ sādhanadharmāsiddhaḥ iti vyācakṣate /
SA15bsa066_u:970: sa cāvasaraḥ prāpta eveti yathākramaṃ nirdiśyate /
SA15bsa066_u:976: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā paramāṇuriti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntatvam /
SA15bsa066_u:990: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:991: buddhau hi sādhanadharmo 'mūrtatvasti sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ nāsti anityatvādbuddhoriti sūtraprayogaḥ sugama eva /
SA15bsa066_u:993: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:1009: tataśca nityaḥ śabdo 'mūrtatvādghaṭavadityatra na sādhyadharmo nityatvalakṣaṇaḥ nāpi sādhanadharmo 'mūrtatvalakṣaṇo 'sti anityatvānmūrtatvādghaṭasyeti /
SA15bsa066_u:1035: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti /
SA15bsa066_u:1042: yathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādiyatra yadyadanityaṃ tattatprayatnāntarīyakam /
SA15bsa066_u:1079: sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāseṣvādau sādhanadharmāsiddha uktaḥ iha sādhyāvyāvṛtta iti kimarthamucyate? /
SA15bsa066_u:1082: vyatirekastu ubhayavyāvṛttirūpaḥ sādhyābhāve ca hetorabhāva iti /
SA15bsa066_u:1106: vinā sādhyasādhananivṛttyā prastutaprayoge yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭamityādilakṣaṇayā /
SA15bsa066_u:1110: yathā ghaṭe 'nityatvaṃ ca murtatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:1114: viparīto viparyasto vyatireka uktalakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:1117: prastutaprayoga eva tathāvidhasādharmyadṛṣṭāntayukte vyatirekamupadeśayan yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭa miti vaktavye yanmūrta tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti /
SA15bsa066_u:1122: tathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādityatra yadaprayatnānantarīyakaṃ tannityamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:1134: ātmapratyāyanārthaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe /
SA15bsa066_u:1141: tathāhi bauddhānāṃ dve eva pramāṇe pratyakṣānumāne /
SA15bsa066_u:1152: kalpanā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā sā apoḍhā apetā yasmāt tat kalpanāpoḍham /
SA15bsa066_u:1159: tacca nirviṣayamapi bhavati ata āha arthe viṣaye /
SA15bsa066_u:1163: iha yaduktaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamiti tatsvarūpābhidhānata eva vyācaṣṭe nāmajātyādikalpanārahitam /
SA15bsa066_u:1174: na hyarthe śabdāḥ anti tadātmāno vā yena tasminpratibhāsamāne te 'pi pratibhāserannityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:1179: yathendriyasāmarthyājjñānamutpadyate tathā viṣayasāmarthyādapi tatkasmādindriyeṇaiva vyapadeśo na viṣayeṇeti? /
SA15bsa066_u:1185: asādhāraṇena ca loke vyapadeśapravṛttiryathā bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
SA15bsa066_u:1189: manovijñānādyapi pratyakṣamityuktaṃ na ca tadanena saṃgṛhītamiti kathaṃ vyāpitā lakṣaṇasya /
SA15bsa066_u:1200: agniratra dhūmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt tadanumānamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:1220: savyāpāravatkhyāteḥ pramāṇatvamiti saha vyāpāreṇa viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇena vartate iti savyāpāram /
SA15bsa066_u:1227: viṣayākāraṃ jñānamutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛṇhadevotpadyate iti pratīteḥ grāhakākārasya pramāṇateti /
SA15bsa066_u:1228: anye tu saṃścāsau vyāpāraḥ sadvyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyavasthākāritvātsannityucyate /
SA15bsa066_u:1229: so 'syā vidyata iti sadyāpāravatī śeṣaṃ pūrvavat vyācakṣate /
SA15bsa066_u:1234: yajjñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā vikalpayataḥ śabdāropitamutpadyate /
SA15bsa066_u:1243: hetvābhāso hi bahuprakāra uktaḥ asti vādibhedena /
SA15bsa066_u:1244: tasmāt hetvābhāsāt yadanumeye 'rthe dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānam avyutpannasya asiddhādisvarūpānabhijñasya bhavati tadanumānābhāsam /
SA15bsa066_u:1259: tasya pratyakṣaviruddhahetvādeḥ prakāśanaṃ prāśnikapratyāyanaṃ na tudbhāvanamātrameva /
SA15bsa066_u:1264: abhūtamavidyamānameva tadyataḥ sādhanadoṣaṃ sāmānyanodbhāvayanti prakāśayanti yāni tāni jātidūṣaṇābhāsāni /
